name: RZ Passage (2.1)
description:
Produce one-of-a-kind and breathtaking visuals of dimensional portals and imaginative conceptual artwork, with a focus on utilizing raw geometrical shapes.

The "getting started" prompts are located on the model preview pictures at the top of this page.

A good negative for starting your creations :

(bad art), (poorly drawn), (blurry), blur,boring, sketch, lackluster, signature, letters, watermark, big tits, big boobs, big chest, (frame), low resolution, oversaturated, intricate, complex,person, man, silhouette

optional negatives but recommended : ” (vivid colors), (vibrant)

Passage ext is available on my GUMROAD, featuring :

  • A different 704*704 trained dataset & settings

  • More than 33 quality prompts & a quick square-to-wide non-destructive tutorial

Note that Passage Ext is not intended to be superior; it's a distinct approach that relies more on personal preference and feels. It still offers a more conceptual / geometric and smoother portals, can be weightened with passage for great different results

We can also note that squared vs vertical format output different things, see below

Quick preview comparing and combining Passage with Passage Ext with minimal prompting :

“A photorealistic landscape of a snowy mountain in winter, best quality, art by rz-passage, deviantart, trending on artstation”

Steps: 25, Sampler: DDIM, CFG scale: 7.5

768*768

512*768

A photorealistic landscape of a desert with some cactus, best quality, art by (rz-passage), deviantart, trending on artstation

Preview of some Passage Ext & prompts package:


You can try the embeddings on prompthunt by using this theme or loading "rzPassage" or "rzPassageExt" in your prompt on the website.

Happy generations everyone !

romerorz.art - Twitter - DeviantArt - Gumroad
